translation.ja: お姉ちゃんも恋しいけど

translation.en: Think about not having a sister. But Lisa was there.
translation.ja: ここではリサがいる

translation.en: [in Korean] When I was having a hard time, I'd look at Rosé, and she'd be the same.
translation.ja: つらくても同じ境遇のロゼがいてくれた

translation.en: [in English] I thought I was really sad, but I'd look at you, and I'd go, "Okay."
translation.ja: リサを見ると元気になれる

translation.en: I think what makes K-pop K-pop is the time that we spend as a trainee.
translation.ja: Ｋ-ＰＯＰは… 練習生として過ごした時が Ｋ-ＰＯＰだと思う

translation.en: We all live together, sort of like a boarding school,
translation.ja: 練習生期間４年～６年 練習生期間４年～６年全寮制の学校みたいに一緒に暮らした 全寮制の学校みたいに一緒に暮らした

translation.en: like a training version.
translation.ja: 全寮制の学校みたいに一緒に暮らした

translation.en: [Rosé] I think there were nine girls.
translation.ja: ９人組かと思ってた

translation.en: They were planning on creating a big group, so they had a lot of girls there.
translation.ja: もっと大人数のグループになる予定だったから

translation.en: [Jennie] They need you to be at their standard in every single subject.
translation.ja: あらゆる面で高いレベルが求められる

translation.en: [in Korean] For me, there were so many lessons in the beginning.
translation.ja: たくさんのレッスンを受けた

translation.en: I took three to four dancing lessons a day and practiced.
translation.ja: ダンスは１日に３～４クラス

translation.en: I had vocal lessons from two to three teachers.
translation.ja: 歌は２～３人の先生に習った

translation.en: It was a rough time.
translation.ja: すごく大変

translation.en: [Rosé in English] We'd get a day off every fortnight,
translation.ja: 13日間連続でトレーニングを受けたあと―

translation.en: and then practice again for another 13 days.
translation.ja: 13日間連続でトレーニングを受けたあと― １日休みがもらえる

translation.en: So 14 hours a day just training. [chuckles]
translation.ja: １日の練習は14時間

translation.en: [Teddy] It's not easy,
translation.ja: 根性がいる

translation.en: the repetition.
translation.ja: 来る日も来る日も練習だ

translation.en: But at such a young age, they are able to absorb all the techniques and the tools
translation.ja: 来る日も来る日も練習だ でも若ければ吸収して上達する その後10年武器となるものをね

translation.en: that they need for their next ten years.
translation.ja: その後10年武器となるものをね

translation.en: [Rosé] There's this basic routine you have to learn in dancing.
translation.ja: ダンスには基本のルーティンがある

translation.en: Jennie was like, "The first thing you have to learn is that, and I'll just teach you the first moves."
translation.ja: ジェニーが色々と教えてくれたんだけど

translation.en: And she was like, "Do this." And I was like, "I don't know how."
translation.ja: 私は戸惑ってばっかりだった

translation.en: [Lisa] I can still remember the first day that you had a dance lesson.
translation.ja: ロゼのレッスン初日のことは忘れられない

translation.en: -[laughs] -'Cause I'd never danced in my life.
translation.ja: 踊ったことなかったもん

translation.en: It was cute.
translation.ja: 可愛かった

translation.en: If you ask a 16-year-old to dance for the first time,
translation.ja: 16歳で初めて踊ったのよ

translation.en: it's the funniest thing. I looked like a…
translation.ja: こんな感じだった

translation.en: And then after that, I got so angry at myself.
translation.ja: あの時 自分に腹が立った

translation.en: I was like, "I am going to become like Lisa."
translation.ja: それでリサを目標にしたの

translation.en: 'Cause Lisa was the dancer. She was like… She was at the top.
translation.ja: 突出して うまかったからね

translation.en: [Rosé] At the end of every month, our boss and all the producers would come,
translation.ja: 毎月末にはボスやプロデューサーの前で

translation.en: and we'd perform a solo song,
translation.ja: 毎月末にはボスやプロデューサーの前で ソロやグループで曲を披露していた

translation.en: a group song, and a group choreography.
translation.ja: ソロやグループで曲を披露していた

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] For that, we'd have to plan everything ourselves, but we each had a role.
translation.ja: 振り付けも自分たちで考えるのよ

translation.en: If someone was in charge of vocals, we'd give them that role,
translation.ja: ボーカルとかいつも役割が振り当てられる

translation.en: but I always took on the role of the dancer.
translation.ja: 私の場合は いつもダンス

translation.en: So I'd always design the choreography.
translation.ja: 振り付けを考えるの

translation.en: Every month! Literally every month
translation.ja: 必ず毎月あった

translation.en: for five years.
translation.ja: それを５年

translation.en: [Lisa] After a monthly review, you would be graded.
translation.ja: その結果で成績がつく

translation.en: You had those who got an A, those with Bs and those with Cs.
translation.ja: Ａ Ｂ Ｃ評価に分かれるの

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I remember having to send a good friend of mine home every month
translation.ja: 毎月 仲よくしていた友達が脱落して―

translation.en: because they got eliminated from the test.
translation.ja: 家に送り返されていった

translation.en: There were so many rules, so many things to just be like,
translation.ja: いい評価を受けるには

translation.en: "Okay, they don't like this. They don't like that."
translation.ja: 色々な基準がある

translation.en: Everything that I did was wrong.
translation.ja: 私は間違ってばかり

translation.en: [Jennie] Being told that I'm not good at stuff face-to-face
translation.ja: 面と向かって厳しいことを言われる

translation.en: and trying to keep everything together when I hear those things…
translation.ja: 酷評されてもなんとか自分を保とうとした

translation.en: It's really harsh.
translation.ja: でも つらかった

translation.en: It wasn't a very happy vibe.
translation.ja: 楽しい感じではない

translation.en: We're not allowed to drink, or smoke, or get a tattoo.
translation.ja: お酒もたばこもタトゥーも禁止

translation.en: [in Korean] I rarely went home and had to practice on the weekends.
translation.ja: 週末も練習で― 家には帰れなかった

translation.en: So my parents were quite upset and worried.
translation.ja: だから両親は心配してたわね

translation.en: But they're not really…
translation.ja: でもそこまで過保護でもなかったし…

translation.en: the protective, overbearing type,
translation.ja: 私のために必要なことだと

translation.en: and they knew this was something that I had to do,
translation.ja: 理解してくれていたの

translation.en: so they told me to stay strong and get it done.
translation.ja: 負けないでやり抜くようにって いつも励まされていた

translation.en: …and I would always call her and tell her, "Mom, it's so hard."
translation.ja: 電話して泣きついてた “つらいよ”ってね

translation.en: She'd say, "Come home." I'd say, "No."
translation.ja: でも それだけ

translation.en: My dad sent me, and he was like, "Rosé, come home."
translation.ja: パパはいつも― “帰っておいで”って言うの

translation.en: He's like, "We want you back home."
translation.ja: “帰っておいで”って言うの

translation.en: And I hated that. I hated it whenever they would say, "Come home." That was the last thing I wanted to hear.
translation.ja: けどそんな言葉を聞きたいわけじゃなかった

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I started a bit later than the others,
translation.ja: 私は始めたのが遅かったから

translation.en: so I was able to make memories with friends and go to school.
translation.ja: 学校に行けたし友達との楽しい思い出もある

translation.en: I consider it a blessing now.
translation.ja: それはラッキーだったと思う

translation.en: [Jennie] I don't regret spending time as a trainee, learning how to dance, how to sing.
translation.ja: 練習生時代を後悔するわけじゃないけど―

translation.en: But one thing I wish is to maybe have lived at home
translation.ja: もう少し家で暮らしたかったかなって思う

translation.en: until I was like 18, 19.
translation.ja: 19歳くらいまではね

translation.en: A lot of people make lots of memories as a high school student.
translation.ja: 普通は皆 楽しい高校生活を経験すると思うけど…

translation.en: But I never had that.
translation.ja: 私は違った

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Waiting was the hardest part.
translation.ja: 待たされることがつらくて―

translation.en: [in Thai] I didn't think I would make it. I was on the verge of letting it go.
translation.ja: 私は かなり限界を感じてた

translation.en: [in English] It was just days on end with just a bunch of girls not knowing where this was going.
translation.ja: 先の見えない日々がずっと続いてた

translation.en: [in Korean] I'd ask myself, "Do you want to give up because it's not easy?"
translation.ja: つらいから辞めようかと自問自答することもあった

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I knew I could do it. The tougher they treated me,
translation.ja: きっとできるという確信が私にはあった

translation.en: I'm like, "I'm gonna get through it,
translation.ja: きっとできるという確信が私にはあった 自分の価値を認めさせようと思ってたの

translation.en: and I'm gonna show them that I'm worth it."
translation.ja: 自分の価値を認めさせようと思ってたの

translation.en: [Rosé] After all of this, I'm not gonna go back without doing anything.
translation.ja: 何もしないで帰るわけにはいかない

translation.en: That would be embarrassing for me. That's what I thought.
translation.ja: 恥ずかしいもの

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] I had to keep fighting. I had to give it my all.
translation.ja: 全てを懸けて 頑張り続けた

translation.en: "I don't care how long the training will take."
translation.ja: どれだけ長くかかっても

translation.en: "Bring it on! I don't care about that anymore!"
translation.ja: 構わないと思うようになったの

translation.en: [Jennie in English] So, the CEO would put us into different groups every other month just to see.
translation.ja: 毎月 ＣＥＯが私たちをグループ分けをするんだけど

translation.en: And there was a point where he pointed the four of us out.
translation.ja: ある時 私たち４人になった

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] We were evaluated together,
translation.ja: この４人で評価されたの

translation.en: and the four of us did screen tests
translation.ja: それからスクリーンテストをして

translation.en: and recorded demos together.
translation.ja: デモ音源をレコーディングした

translation.en: [Lisa] It happened naturally.
translation.ja: 自然な流れだった

translation.en: We just clicked.
translation.ja: 息がぴったりだったもの

translation.en: [Jennie] We just got along so well.
translation.ja: すごくうまくいった

translation.en: Because usually there's like, "Oh, I wanna sing more."
translation.ja: 大抵は“もっと歌いたい”とか

translation.en: Or, "Oh, I wanna be in the middle." There's always those little fights going on in the groups.
translation.ja: “センターがいい”とかモメ事が起こるものなの

translation.en: But when it was the four of us, it was clear what we were doing.
translation.ja: だけど私たち４人の場合は―

translation.en: And that's what made it possible for us to be in a group.
translation.ja: 皆が自分の役割を理解していた

translation.en: You know, four girls being in one group is not easy.
translation.ja: ガールズグループって難しい

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] When you're working in a group,
translation.ja: グループでのパフォーマンスでも

translation.en: everyone has their place and a role.
translation.ja: それぞれの持ち味が出せてると思う

translation.en: And when everyone settles into their roles,
translation.ja: それぞれの持ち味が出せてると思う だから１人ひとりが輝ける

translation.en: that's how synergy is born.
translation.ja: 結果 シナジー効果が生まれてる

translation.en: That realization changed my outlook. When everyone is where they need to be,
translation.ja: 自分の役割を理解することで―

translation.en: big things can happen.
translation.ja: 私も変わった

translation.en: [Teddy] When I first came in the picture, there were seven, eight, nine girls.
translation.ja: 最初に写真を見せられた時は７～９人いた

translation.en: Then we started cutting some songs,
translation.ja: いいと感じたものを

translation.en: and sonically, whatever that sounded the best.
translation.ja: 何曲かレコーディングした

translation.en: The four girls right now, the combination.
translation.ja: この４人は相性がいいね

translation.en: And of course you start looking at their individuality,
translation.ja: もちろん１人ずつ見ても

translation.en: like their character.
translation.ja: 皆 個性的だ

translation.en: The four of them just felt right.
translation.ja: 最高の４人だよ

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Teddy felt like a CEO to us.
translation.ja: テディはＣＥＯくらいすごい人なの

translation.en: If somebody did something with Teddy or met with Teddy…
translation.ja: 彼との面会や打ち合わせってなったら…

translation.en: [gasps] …it was considered to be a big deal.
translation.ja: 喜ぶべき一大事なの それくらい限られた人しか会えない

translation.en: [Lisa] I didn't know much about him. I knew he was a 1TYM member.
translation.ja: 詳しくは知らないけど彼は1TYMのメンバーだった

translation.en: [Teddy in English] It's a different time,
translation.ja: 今とは時代が違った

translation.en: and I just wanted to become someone that I needed when I was young.
translation.ja: 今とは時代が違った 当時は自分の理想像があって―

translation.en: I didn't have somebody that's a little more outside looking in, telling me where to go.
translation.ja: 誰かに指示を受けたりはしなかったよ

translation.en: [in Korean] The first time we met was when--
translation.ja: 出会ったのは…

translation.en: [Jisoo] When I was a trainee.
translation.ja: 練習生の時

translation.en: [in English] I was so nervous. I couldn't really talk to him.
translation.ja: 緊張して話せなかった

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] Meeting you was like the final stage of the debut.
translation.ja: 簡単に会える人じゃないと思ってた

translation.en: You were the final boss. If we meet you, we get to debut.
translation.ja: デビュー前に会う最後のボスって感じ

translation.en: Oppa, do you remember… how we had to record that whistling sound 1,000 times?
translation.ja: 1000回録り直したの覚えてる？

translation.en: -[in English] That I'll never forget. -[girls laughing]
translation.ja: 覚えてる

translation.en: I cannot forget that.
translation.ja: 忘れられない

translation.en: And we almost didn't come out with "Whistle" for our debut song, but--
translation.ja: デビュー曲を“WHISTLE”にするかでモメた

translation.en: [Teddy] Too many people thought it was risky.
translation.ja: 反対が多かった

translation.en: But last minute, we were like, "It has to be that one."
translation.ja: でも変えなかった

translation.en: [Teddy] 'Cause it has this weird country vibe to it,
translation.ja: 抑えた曲調だし―

translation.en: and it's super minimal. It just sounded too empty for a lot of people.
translation.ja: 物足りないと思われたんだろう

translation.en: Most people were against it. We just pushed forward, whatever.
translation.ja: リスクはあったけど押しとおした

translation.en: Hey, you know that photo there?
translation.ja: あの写真は

translation.en: That's our very first photo session as BLACKPINK.
translation.ja: BLACKPINKで撮った最初のものだ

translation.en: [Jennie] Yeah.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: It's oppa's favorite photo.
translation.ja: 気に入ってるのね

translation.en: As soon as I saw that photo, how it turned out, I was like,  "Oh, this is gonna be fun."
translation.ja: あの写真を見た時これはいいと思った

translation.en: [reporter 1 in Korean] YG Entertainment is expected
translation.ja: ＹＧエンターテイメントから新グループがデビュー

translation.en: to showcase its first new girl group in seven years since 2NE1 debuted.
translation.ja: ＹＧエンターテイメントから新グループがデビュー 2NE1以来 ７年振りです

translation.en: [reporter 2] Under the direction of producer Teddy, this new group is being prepared.
translation.ja: テディがガールズグループをプロデュースします

translation.en: Its members and debut songs have been shrouded in secrecy.
translation.ja: メンバーの詳細もまだ明かされていません

translation.en: I'm shaking!
translation.ja: 緊張する

translation.en: -So shaky! -[staff laughing]
translation.ja: 震えてる

translation.en: "Various… diverse colors…"
translation.ja: 様々な…

translation.en: [sighs] How does it go?
translation.ja: 何だっけ？

translation.en: [in English] All I wanted was people to see the potential in us.
translation.ja: 将来性があると思ってほしかった

translation.en: It didn't necessarily have to be, "Wow! This group came out,
translation.ja: “完璧なグループだ”って

translation.en: and they're so perfect in every single way."
translation.ja: 思われるよりもね

translation.en: Like, I wanted people to be curious about us.
translation.ja: 興味を持ってほしかったの

translation.en: [in Korean] Hello everyone.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: I'm BLACKPINK's Rosé.
translation.ja: BLACKPINKのロゼです

translation.en: Hello everyone. I'm BLACKPINK's Jennie.
translation.ja: BLACKPINKのジェニーです

translation.en: Hello everyone.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: I'm BLACKPINK's Jisoo.
translation.ja: BLACKPINKのジスです

translation.en: Hello everyone. I'm BLACKPINK's Lisa.
translation.ja: BLACKPINKのリサです

translation.en: Uh… after training with my members all this time
translation.ja: この４人でデビューできて

translation.en: and finally being able to debut on this stage,
translation.ja: この４人でデビューできて すごくうれしく思います

translation.en: I'm nervous and excited.
translation.ja: すごくうれしく思います

translation.en: In the future, we will work hard to show everyone
translation.ja: BLACKPINKの様々なカラーを

translation.en: BLACKPINK's unique colors.
translation.ja: 見せていきたいです

translation.en: Please love us!
translation.ja: 応援してください

translation.en: [all together] Thank you!
translation.ja: お願いします

translation.en: [in English] As soon as we debuted…
translation.ja: デビュー後は

translation.en: [in Korean] …I think it happened just the way I thought it would.
translation.ja: 想像どおりの展開だった

translation.en: [in English] Let's go!
translation.ja: いくわよ

translation.en: [all together in Korean] Hello.
translation.ja: お願いします

translation.en: I can't wait. Can you tell us who's performing next?
translation.ja: 次に登場するのは？

translation.en: Two of their songs debuted exclusively at Inkigayo last week and could be number one!
translation.ja: 先週２つのデビュー曲をテレビで初披露

translation.en: [man] Shall we see the performance of BLACKPINK, the hottest rookies right now?
translation.ja: 今 最も話題の新人と言えます

translation.en: -Music… -…start!
translation.ja: それでは どうぞ

translation.en: [reporter 3 in Korean] YG's new girl group, BLACKPINK,
translation.ja: ＹＧのBLACKPINKが

translation.en: has reached number one only 14 days after their debut,
translation.ja: デビューから14日で１位を獲得

translation.en: which is the shortest time ever by a girl group to reach number one.
translation.ja: ガールズグループとしては最速記録です

translation.en: [Jisoo] I remember making our debut and winning awards.
translation.ja: 賞を受賞したことは思い出に残ってる

translation.en: [in Korean] And feeling like, "Wow! We did it."
translation.ja: 信じられない気持ちだった

translation.en: [Jisoo] "Whistle" kept going up and up, and when it hit number one,
translation.ja: “WHISTLE”は徐々に順位を上げて１位に

translation.en: we were just so happy and excited.
translation.ja: すごくうれしかった

translation.en: [Jennie] Honestly, I think I was most surprised when "Whistle" reached number one on the music charts.
translation.ja: 正直 １位を取れるとは思ってなかったから

translation.en: That was the most exciting.
translation.ja: うれしかった

translation.en: [in English] I remember we were… [in Korean] …in a practice room when we heard the news that we were number two.
translation.ja: ２位になった知らせは練習部屋で聞いた

translation.en: I kept on checking and checking, but we had to go to practice.
translation.ja: それから気になって…

translation.en: We'd check every hour.
translation.ja: １時間毎にチェック

translation.en: And then someone came in and said, "Oh, my God!"
translation.ja: １時間毎にチェック 飛び上がって喜んだよね

translation.en: [in English] We jumped up and down.
translation.ja: 飛び上がって喜んだよね

translation.en: [in Korean] I remember my friends telling me that they heard it.
translation.ja: “街で曲が流れてる”って

translation.en: They were like, "I'm outside, and they're playing your song!"
translation.ja: 友達から連絡もきた

translation.en: It felt really weird back then.
translation.ja: 変な感覚で―

translation.en: I was like, "Oh, my God, that's so cool! Shoot a video! Send me the video!"
translation.ja: “ビデオを撮って送って”と言ったわ

translation.en: [in English] Lisa! I love you!
translation.ja: リサ 大好きよ！

translation.en: [fan 1] I just really like their style.
translation.ja: カッコいいわ

translation.en: Their sound is super different from other K-pop groups.
translation.ja: 他のＫ-ＰＯＰとも違う

translation.en: [fan 2] It's 'cause they have so many foreign members,
translation.ja: 多国籍なグループよね

translation.en: and it really shows how anyone can achieve their dreams.
translation.ja: 夢はかなうと教えてくれる

translation.en: [fan 3] They own the stage when they're on it. [in Korean] Their dance is so powerful.
translation.ja: ステージ上ではすごくパワフルなの

translation.en: [in Dutch] When their music is played, you just instantly start dancing.
translation.ja: 彼女たちの曲を聞くと踊りたくなる

translation.en: [in English] They have the strongest friendship I've seen in a K-pop group.
translation.ja: ４人とも仲が良さそう

translation.en: [in Spanish] You can see they love what they are doing and are born to do it.
translation.ja: 歌もダンスも心から楽しんでるわよね

translation.en: [in English] I felt like this is a girl group that I can actually vibe with.
translation.ja: ガールズグループだけど好きよ

translation.en: [in English] You know, they cool. They the baddest bitches alive. [laughs]
translation.ja: カッコいいし 小悪魔的よね

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] When I was a trainee, nobody knew about me.
translation.ja: 練習生時代は無名だった

translation.en: But after I debuted as BLACKPINK,
translation.ja: なのにデビューした途端―

translation.en: everyone would follow me no matter where I went.
translation.ja: どこに行ってもファンがいる

translation.en: I didn't know that we would become this famous.
translation.ja: こんなに有名になるとは思ってなかった

translation.en: [Rosé in English] How much did you sleep last night?
translation.ja: 昨日は寝れた？

translation.en: [in Korean] Three hours.
translation.ja: ３時間ね

translation.en: -[in English] Three hours? -Yup.
translation.ja: ３時間？

translation.en: -[staff 1 in Korean] Clear in front. -[staff 2] Everybody get out.
translation.ja: 前を空けてくれ みんな 端によけて

translation.en: [Rosé in English] During trainee days, I was desperate. I really wanted it.
translation.ja: 練習生時代はただ必死だった

translation.en: But after debut, that's when you start getting a lot of responsibilities.
translation.ja: デビューしてからは責任感が芽生えた

translation.en: [Jisoo] Then came the pressure for our next thing.
translation.ja: プレッシャーを感じるようになった

translation.en: "What now? What do we do?"
translation.ja: 何をどうするべきか分からなくて―

translation.en: "Let's come up with something fresh." I felt like we were being chased.
translation.ja: 何をどうするべきか分からなくて― 常に追われてる感じ

translation.en: [director in English] Action!
translation.ja: アクション！

translation.en: [in Korean] The winner is BLACKPINK!
translation.ja: 受賞者はBLACKPINK

translation.en: Thank you! I love you all!
translation.ja: みんな ありがとう

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] It's a big day for BLACKPINK as "Ddu-Du Ddu-Du" has become
translation.ja: “DDU-DU DDU-DU”の24時間内での再生回数が

translation.en: the most viewed Korean music video in 24 hours.
translation.ja: Ｋ-ＰＯＰ史上最高記録を樹立しました

translation.en: [reporter 2] Three music videos with over 400 million views.
translation.ja: ４億回再生を達成

translation.en: [reporter 3] One billion views on YouTube.
translation.ja: ユーチューブでは10億回再生されました

translation.en: [Rosé] I think when things get faster,
translation.ja: 物事があまりに早く進んで―

translation.en: it also becomes very overwhelming at some points.
translation.ja: 圧倒されるようになった

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] I still remember the first time…
translation.ja: タイに帰国した時のことはよく覚えてる

translation.en: [Lisa] I went back to Thailand after my debut. Because Thai teens see me as a Thai who has made it this far.
translation.ja: 私に憧れてくれる人がタイにはたくさんいる

translation.en: They would say, "I want to be like Lisa."
translation.ja: “リサみたいになりたい”って

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Lisa!
translation.ja: リサ！　リサ！

translation.en: WELCOME HOME LISA WE MISSED YOU
translation.ja: “おかえり”

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] But at that moment,
translation.ja: 私がロールモデルにふさわしいか―

translation.en: I wasn't sure if I was really good enough to be their role model.
translation.ja: 私がロールモデルにふさわしいか― あの時はまだ自信がなかった

translation.en: [in Korean] I'm a singer…
translation.ja: 歌手ではあるけど…

translation.en: but I didn't know what kind of singer I wanted to be.
translation.ja: どんな歌手になりたいか分かってなかった

translation.en: I kind of lost the goal. I was trying to find myself.
translation.ja: 目標を見失って自分らしさを探していた

translation.en: [in Thai] Could I really become their role model?
translation.ja: 憧れに足る存在なのか とか

translation.en: What should I do to not let them down?
translation.ja: がっかりさせたくないとか…

translation.en: These kinds of thoughts kept running through my mind.
translation.ja: そんなことをずっと考えてた

translation.en: [Jennie in English] We need sugar.
translation.ja: 砂糖が要る

translation.en: [in singsong voice] We need sugar.
translation.ja: 砂糖ね

translation.en: -[Jisoo] One spoon. -One spoon.
translation.ja: ひとさじよ 分かった

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] You like this too. Tanghulu is different.
translation.ja: サンジン好きでしょ

translation.en: [Jennie] Tanghulu has the sweetness of the fruits.
translation.ja: フルーツの甘みがたっぷりだからね

translation.en: The ratio is a little off because we haven't made it in a while. -There was too much sugar. -It's a bit burnt.
translation.ja: 久しぶりに作るから砂糖を入れすぎちゃった

translation.en: -It still looks delicious. -Yeah.
translation.ja: おいしそう

translation.en: [in English] This is actually a Chinese traditional snack,
translation.ja: これは中国のお菓子よ

translation.en: but it's hard to find it here in Korea.
translation.ja: 韓国ではあまり売られてない

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] We almost started a fire once.
translation.ja: 一度 火事を起こしそうになった

translation.en: -We were making too much. -Yeah, we almost burnt it.
translation.ja: 一度 火事を起こしそうになった 危なかったね

translation.en: We almost made this dorm disappear. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 寮が焼けるところだった

translation.en: [Jennie in English] This is a way of me teaching Jisoo to speak English.
translation.ja: ジスに英語を教えてるの

translation.en: She got better in the last six months.
translation.ja: 半年で随分 上達した

translation.en: She understands everything that I say, so I do talk to her in English sometimes.
translation.ja: 私が言ってることは理解してるみたい

translation.en: -[Jennie in Korean] How is it? -Mm.
translation.ja: どう？

translation.en: Is it good? I want a taste.
translation.ja: おいしい？

translation.en: It's warm.
translation.ja: 熱いよ

translation.en: It's a bit burnt.
translation.ja: 少し焦げてる

translation.en: [in English] Not bad.
translation.ja: 悪くない

translation.en: Not bad but not good.
translation.ja: 良くもない

translation.en: Yeah. Let's be honest. It was a fail.
translation.ja: 正直言うと 失敗作ね

translation.en: [in Korean] No. We didn't add any water.
translation.ja: 水を足さなかった

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -No, you don't add water.
translation.ja: 何言ってるの？ 水を足さなかったでしょ

translation.en: Unnie! You add water.
translation.ja: ちゃんと足したわよ

translation.en: You add water? No, you don't add water.
translation.ja: ウソ？　本当に？

translation.en: What am I going to do about you? Nothing works without me.
translation.ja: やっぱり私がいなきゃダメね

translation.en: [in English] In Korea, one of the first things you ask, other than your name, is how old are you?
translation.ja: 韓国では名前の次に年齢を尋ねるの

translation.en: And as soon as they say they're older, it's like, "Oh, you're unnie."
translation.ja: それで年上だったら“オンニ”と呼ぶ

translation.en: So, unnie is basically what you call an older sister.
translation.ja: “オンニ”は年上の女性に対して使う言葉なの

translation.en: It's like--
translation.ja: この言葉は…

translation.en: [in Korean] Other places don't have it.
translation.ja: 韓国特有ね

translation.en: [in English] We don't call each other by names.
translation.ja: 名前では呼び合わないからね

translation.en: It's normally unnie if you're older than me, and oppa if you're a guy.
translation.ja: だから“オンニ”か男性なら“オッパ”よ

translation.en: It takes a while to get used to, but once you get a hold of it,
translation.ja: 慣れるまで時間がかかるけど 名前より呼びやすくなるわ

translation.en: it's better than calling their names.
translation.ja: 名前より呼びやすくなるわ

translation.en: She's not Jisoo. She's unnie. It's like family, in a way.
translation.ja: オンニって呼んだほうが家族っぽいし

translation.en: [in Korean] When I first came to train as a singer,
translation.ja: トレーニングを始めたばかりの頃―

translation.en: I had never tried singing or dancing before.
translation.ja: 私は歌もダンスもできなかった

translation.en: I was lost, but you taught me a lot.
translation.ja: 戸惑う私を助けてくれた

translation.en: For two of us, it was-- The competition was fierce at the time.
translation.ja: 当時 練習生は20～30人くらいいて

translation.en: There were about 20 to 30 trainees.
translation.ja: 競争が激しかった

translation.en: Because we are the older ones of the group,
translation.ja: 私たちは年上だったから

translation.en: the others came to us with the issues they were having.
translation.ja: よく相談されたよね

translation.en: I knew what their problems were. They'd ask us, "Unnie, what should we do?"
translation.ja: 皆 どうするべきかいつも悩んでいた

translation.en: And I'd advise them to speak their mind, but they have a hard time doing that,
translation.ja: 思ったことを話すようにアドバイスして

translation.en: so I end up taking care of it.
translation.ja: それを聞いてあげてた

translation.en: There's no doubt I feel a sense of responsibility.
translation.ja: 皆の力になってあげなくちゃと―

translation.en: I try the best I can to take care of the other girls.
translation.ja: 責任感を持っていた

translation.en: [in English] It's okay, actually. I could eat this.
translation.ja: うん 食べられる

translation.en: [in Korean] Semi-success.
translation.ja: まあまあ 成功って感じ

translation.en: [man in English] Okay. It's just Rosé and the beat.
translation.ja: ロゼの声とビートだけ

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -No words, no melody whatsoever. [man] So here we go.
translation.ja: セリフもメロディもなし

translation.en: [Rosé] You know how when people say they're afraid of heights or they're afraid of water?
translation.ja: 高い所や海を怖がる人もいるけど―

translation.en: I've always been so afraid of getting in the studio or writing something.
translation.ja: 私が怖いのはスタジオと曲作りね

translation.en: I always thought just someday I have to just start it. I have to.
translation.ja: いつかは曲作りを始めようと思ってた

translation.en: -I'm gonna still keep this one. -Okay.
translation.ja: 良かったけど 良かったけどジョー･〝ビンス〞･リー ジョー･〝ビンス〞･リー

translation.en: -Let's try one more time. -Okay.
translation.ja: ジョー･〝ビンス〞･リーもう１回やろう もう１回やろう もう１回やろうアーティスト兼プロデューサー

translation.en: Do I change the rhythm? I keep going for the same thing.
translation.ja: アーティスト兼プロデューサーリズムを変えたほうがいい？ リズムを変えたほうがいい？

translation.en: -Do you feel uncomfortable singing it? -Do I feel uncomfortable singing it?
translation.ja: 歌いづらい？ ちょっと歌いづらいけど―

translation.en: Like slightly. Maybe I'll try singing it one more time.
translation.ja: ちょっと歌いづらいけど― もう１回やってみる

translation.en: I've seen Joe a few times, and his music's like amazing.
translation.ja: ジョーの作る音楽は最高

translation.en: I was just like, to Teddy, "What do you think if he helps me out?"
translation.ja: だから手伝ってもらうことにしたの

translation.en: So here's what we worked on. This is Rosé's first recorded song.
translation.ja: これはロゼが最初にレコーディングした曲

translation.en: [Rosé] We even saved this whole file in this secret folder
translation.ja: ファイルごと隠してるの

translation.en: because I said nobody can listen to it. I was like, "Hide it from everyone."
translation.ja: 誰にも聞かれたくないから 秘密にしてる

translation.en: When it comes to writing songs, Rosé has certain stories in mind.
translation.ja: 曲を作る時ロゼの頭には物語ができてる

translation.en: And she's shy about sharing that story. It's just super personal to her.
translation.ja: でもあまりに個人的すぎて共有したがらない

translation.en: It's like her diary.
translation.ja: 日記みたいだ

translation.en: [Rosé laughs] Oh, my gosh!
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: You sounded nervous in that one.
translation.ja: 緊張してたね

translation.en: Yeah. I'm like, "I don't know what I'm doing." [giggles]
translation.ja: 分からなくなって…

translation.en: I was thinking it'd be fun if I write something like…
translation.ja: こんな感じを考えてた

translation.en: [sings in Korean] ♪ After two, three o’clock… ♪ ♪ When I call you ♪
translation.ja: 君に電話をかけたのは＿＿＿＿３時も過ぎた頃

translation.en: ♪ And when you see my call… ♪
translation.ja: 着信を見た時に…

translation.en: Something like that.
translation.ja: こんな感じ

translation.en: -I think it's fine. -I want to hide right now.
translation.ja: いいと思う まだ秘密で

translation.en: -No. -I don't think I can do this. [laughs]
translation.ja: どうして できない

translation.en: [in English] Teddy told me yesterday too.
translation.ja: テディにも言われた

translation.en: He was like, "You need to learn how to be more vulnerable in the studio."
translation.ja: スタジオでは守りに入るなって

translation.en: That's something I can't do too easily, but I was gonna say--
translation.ja: そんな簡単にはできないけど…

translation.en: -[Joe] I mean, it takes time. -Yeah.
translation.ja: ゆっくりでいい

translation.en: I really have a lot of respect for music,
translation.ja: 私には音楽が大切だから―

translation.en: so I don't wanna be just like another girl who sings
translation.ja: 私には音楽が大切だから― ただ歌うだけの歌手にはなりたくない

translation.en: and just kind of tells everybody that she writes music.
translation.ja: ただ歌うだけの歌手にはなりたくない

translation.en: That's the last thing I wanna be.
translation.ja: 絶対にイヤ

translation.en: -Whoa, I need one of these. -[Joe] Yeah.
translation.ja: これいいね

translation.en: -[Rosé] Oh, my gosh. -[plays chords]
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: I feel more intimidated when I'm by myself.
translation.ja: １人でいる時 不安になる

translation.en: When I'm in my room by myself, and I go, "Should I try and write something?"
translation.ja: 部屋にいて曲を書こうとすると

translation.en: I think I'm way more intimidated then.
translation.ja: もっと怖くなるの

translation.en: 'Cause it's just me. I don't know if my opinions are right,
translation.ja: 自分の考えが正しいか不安だし

translation.en: and that scares me. I feel like I scare myself the most.
translation.ja: 一番 自分自身を恐れてる

translation.en: [Joe] Okay, let's record that.  What's our tempo?
translation.ja: それでいこう　テンポは？

translation.en: I found these chords maybe like a month ago.
translation.ja: これを思いついたのは… 先月くらい

translation.en: I was like-- I liked it. I was like, "This sounds cool."
translation.ja: すごく気に入って

translation.en: And ever since then, I just play it.
translation.ja: ずっと弾いてた

translation.en: [Joe] If anything, I was gonna put you in the booth and sing over it.
translation.ja: とりあえず歌ってみて

translation.en: [Rosé giggles] Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Do you think I could do it? I've never tried this.
translation.ja: うまくできるかな？

translation.en: [Joe] I think you can do it. Let's just give it a try.
translation.ja: とにかくやってみよう

translation.en: It's nice to have just the right amount of people in the room,
translation.ja: ここには限られた人しかいないし

translation.en: who are just there to accept whatever is there and make it into something.
translation.ja: 何をしても受け止めてもらえる

translation.en: Joe always says, "This is the safe ground. Everything's a secret in here."
translation.ja: ジョーがここは安全地帯だと言ってくれた

translation.en: "You can make a fool out of yourself, and we won't tell anyone."
translation.ja: どんなことも秘密にしてくれるとね

translation.en: It feels just like expressing myself.
translation.ja: だから自分を表現できる

translation.en: Whereas I would always sing songs of other artists.
translation.ja: 他のアーティストの曲を歌う時は

translation.en: That's more like borrowing their emotions and making it mine.
translation.ja: その人の感情を借りてる感じ

translation.en: Whereas this is totally just speaking from my point of view.
translation.ja: 自分の曲では自分の思いをさらけ出す感じね

translation.en: I'm almost like a baby trying to speak in the music,
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんが初めて言葉を発する時みたい

translation.en: trying to sing… for the first time.
translation.ja: 初めて…　歌おうとしてる

translation.en: -[giggles] I lost it again. -[Joe] We got it.
translation.ja: 間違えた よかったよ

translation.en: [Jennie] Lisa, should I wear this on my way back?
translation.ja: リサ これ着るべき？

translation.en: [Rosé in Korean] Kuma!
translation.ja: クマ！

translation.en: [in English] BLACKPINK hoodie?
translation.ja: BLACKPINKのパーカー

translation.en: -I think you should. -[Jennie] Right?
translation.ja: 着るべきね

translation.en: Hello. Ah, ow! You just bit me.  Coco bit me. Ah!
translation.ja: 痛い　ココにかまれた

translation.en: Coco like, "I don't care."
translation.ja: 知らんぷりね

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I have so many clothes, but there's not enough space,
translation.ja: 洋服が収まりきらなくて

translation.en: so I keep them on the balcony. [laughs]
translation.ja: バルコニーに置いてる

translation.en: Don't we have to pack for the event in Japan?
translation.ja: 日本に行く準備してるの？

translation.en: You have to bring something like this. It's cold.
translation.ja: 寒いから厚手の服が要る

translation.en: -Bring a scarf too. -Oh, I don't have a scarf!
translation.ja: スカーフとか 持ってない

translation.en: -Give me one. -You are funny.
translation.ja: ちょうだい まったく

translation.en: -Give me one. -I can't.
translation.ja: ちょうだいよ あげない

translation.en: That's not a scarf.
translation.ja: それスカーフじゃない

translation.en: It is so tiring when we work,
translation.ja: 仕事をしてると疲れるけど

translation.en: but when we don't work, I get stressed out about not working.
translation.ja: 仕事してないのもストレス

translation.en: I think it's that. It's a dilemma.
translation.ja: ジレンマよね

translation.en: When we work, I really want to rest,
translation.ja: 仕事中は休みたいと思うけど

translation.en: but when we don't work, I end up wondering, "What am I doing?"
translation.ja: 休んでるとそれはそれで不安になる

translation.en: [Rosé] This job has a lot of ups and downs.
translation.ja: この仕事には波がある

translation.en: [Jisoo] There's nothing we can do about it.
translation.ja: どうにもならない

translation.en: It's very random, and there's no regularity.
translation.ja: 不規則な仕事だし仕事量も一定じゃない

translation.en: The thing is, you can never tell how long this will last,
translation.ja: いつまで続くか分からないし

translation.en: so estimating is impossible. That's most challenging.
translation.ja: 予測するのは不可能よね

translation.en: [Jennie in English] This year has been on the road.
translation.ja: 今年は世界を回ってた

translation.en: This year has been pack and unpack, and unpack and pack and unpack.
translation.ja: 行って帰って 行って帰ってその繰り返し

translation.en: That's a song.
translation.ja: 歌みたい

translation.en: [Jennie] At least right now, we're prepared enough to plan the resting part,
translation.ja: 少なくとも今年は他のことを考えられる

translation.en: 'cause last year, we were just like spending time like…
translation.ja: 去年は そんな暇もなかった

translation.en: And then the tour hit us,
translation.ja: ツアーもあったし

translation.en: and we're like, "Oh, my God." [Rosé] Yeah.
translation.ja: 本当に大変だった

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I think we were together for three years before we went on the world tour.
translation.ja: 世界ツアーを回るまで３年を一緒に過ごした

translation.en: [Jennie in English] It was a long tour, about nine months.
translation.ja: ９ヵ月に及んだ

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] We started the world tour in Asia,
translation.ja: 世界ツアーはアジアからスタートした

translation.en: but Coachella marked the start of our tour in North America.
translation.ja: 世界ツアーはアジアからスタートした 北アメリカはコーチェラから始まった

translation.en: [Rosé in English] When they said that we're gonna start going outside of Asia,
translation.ja: アジア以外でもツアーをするなんて…

translation.en: that was like a dream.
translation.ja: 夢みたい

translation.en: [in Korean] And blow them kisses here and stuff,
translation.ja: ソロの間に出て来て

translation.en: because you're coming out during the chorus before you kiss.
translation.ja: 観客に向かってキスする

translation.en: Oh, the next chorus?
translation.ja: ソロのあと？

translation.en: You're coming out during the chorus before you kiss.
translation.ja: ソロの間　キスの前

translation.en: You want me to come out before that chorus?
translation.ja: ソロの前ってこと？

translation.en: Come out slowly and play here. It was getting boring when you stay out there for too long.
translation.ja: ゆっくり出て来てここにいればいい

translation.en: [Lisa] A much more diverse group of fans
translation.ja: 世界中にいる私たちのファンが 楽しみに待ってくれている

translation.en: will be looking forward to seeing us.
translation.ja: 楽しみに待ってくれている

translation.en: [Rosé in English] We wanted to bring them the best show possible.
translation.ja: 最高のライブにしたい

translation.en: [choreographer in Korean] Whether it be "Playing With Fire" or "Boombayah"…
translation.ja: “Playing with Fire” か“Boombayah”

translation.en: you don't look like you're dancing hard enough.
translation.ja: ダンスに勢いがない

translation.en: -We're not dancing hard enough? -Not hard enough.
translation.ja: もっとしっかり踊れ

translation.en: The audience needs to be mesmerized by your energy, up close.
translation.ja: 君たちのエネルギーで観客を魅了するんだ

translation.en: I know that you guys know the dance well, but put in a bit more effort.
translation.ja: もっと努力できるはずだ

translation.en: Jisoo, you need to get the notes right.
translation.ja: ジス 間違えるなよ

translation.en: You messed up on the rhythm before, right? Too fast?
translation.ja: 速かったぞ 音に初めて合わせたから

translation.en: I practiced with MR for the first time when I got here.
translation.ja: 音に初めて合わせたから

translation.en: [choreographer] The notes are a bit unstable when you first go in.
translation.ja: 入りがいつも不安定だ

translation.en: But we shouldn't have said that on camera.
translation.ja: カメラに撮られてたな

translation.en: They'll never air this.
translation.ja: これで放送されない

translation.en: [reporter 1 in Korean] The media says that K-pop queens have landed.
translation.ja: Ｋ-ＰＯＰのクイーンが到着

translation.en: [in English] BLACKPINK, welcome to Thailand. Yay!
translation.ja: タイへようこそ

translation.en: [in Korean] Girl group BLACKPINK heat up their first world tour stop, Thailand.
translation.ja: 世界ツアーでは最初にタイに訪れます

translation.en: It's special to have a concert in Lisa's hometown.
translation.ja: リサの故郷でライブができて うれしく思います

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] This is the first concert where BLACKPINK has been able
translation.ja: 今回 初めてタイにいるファンのために ライブを行うことができます

translation.en: to meet our Thai fans.
translation.ja: ライブを行うことができます

translation.en: We will do our very best and will not disappoint the BLINKS.
translation.ja: BLINKSの期待に応えたいです

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I want to give a performance that I can look at and be content with.
translation.ja: ファンと一体になれるライブにしたい

translation.en: My focus is leaving the stage having given a performance I have no regrets about.
translation.ja: 後悔のないパフォーマンをするだけ

translation.en: So when I get out there, I'm thinking, "Don't mess this up."
translation.ja: 始まる前に思うことは “絶対に成功させる”

translation.en: [Jisoo] "You've got to nail this."
translation.ja: それだけよ

translation.en: [Jennie in English] Since it was our very first world tour, it's amazing to see all these fans
translation.ja: 初の世界ツアーで各地のファンに会えた

translation.en: filling up the big arenas that we didn't expect.
translation.ja: 想像以上の大きなアリーナでね

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Everything was new to me on my first tour.
translation.ja: 初の世界ツアーよ初めてのことばかりだった

translation.en: It was so great to meet so many fans around the world.
translation.ja: ファンに会えるのもうれしい

translation.en: [Jennie in English] Once it gets going, for, like, the next 30 days,
translation.ja: ツアーが始まってから約１ヵ月は―

translation.en: to try to give them the best stage every day is a lot of pressure.
translation.ja: 毎日プレッシャーを感じていた

translation.en: [Jennie] After so many plane rides and so many environment changes,
translation.ja: 飛行機で移動する度環境も変わるし 飛行機で移動する度環境も変わるしシンガポール 飛行機で移動する度環境も変わるし 飛行機で移動する度環境も変わるしクアラルンプール

translation.en: our body just gives up on us.
translation.ja: 体力的にキツかった台北

translation.en: -[in Korean] It feels like it's sprained. -Is it worse on this side?
translation.ja: 捻挫かな 外側？

translation.en: [Jennie in English] When I'm home, I like to workout and take care of my body
translation.ja: 帰ったら 体をケアしないと

translation.en: 'cause I'm like a grandma. I'm sick everywhere.
translation.ja: おばあちゃんみたいよ

translation.en: Honestly, I need to take care of myself.
translation.ja: 体全体が痛い

translation.en: I lose breath a little easier than other people,
translation.ja: すぐに息が切れるし

translation.en: and I can't jump as much as other people.
translation.ja: 皆よりジャンプできてない

translation.en: [Rosé] I think, at first, I didn't know what I was headed towards.
translation.ja: 先のことを全く予想できてなかった

translation.en: [staff] Okay. Let's go.
translation.ja: さあ いくわよ

translation.en: I thought it would all be just really exciting and fun.
translation.ja: 楽しみにでしかなかったから

translation.en: [in Korean] I’m going to eat it without ketchup.
translation.ja: ケチャップはいらない

translation.en: [Rosé in English] In the middle of it, I didn't feel like I had a personal life.
translation.ja: だけど途中からプライベートがないと

translation.en: It felt like there was this big hole in my life.
translation.ja: 感じ始めてしまったの

translation.en: What I'm basically living for is tomorrow's show.
translation.ja: 毎日ライブをこなすだけ

translation.en: I love being on stage because that's when I feel the most alive,
translation.ja: ステージ上ではすごく生きてると感じる

translation.en: yet when we come back to the hotel, I felt so empty.
translation.ja: でもホテルに戻ると抜け殻になる

translation.en: [in Korean] I'm hungry, so I ordered something simple.
translation.ja: おなかがすいちゃってご飯を頼んだ

translation.en: [in English] Poached eggs. Ta-da!
translation.ja: ポーチドエッグ

translation.en: And that's when I realized I'm homesick.
translation.ja: ホームシックだと気付いた

translation.en: [in Korean] Delicious.
translation.ja: おいしい

translation.en: [in English] Yeah! Let's go!
translation.ja: さあ 始めるわよ

translation.en: [Jennie] Lisa is the most constant one.
translation.ja: リサはいつも明るくて―

translation.en: She brings positive energy into the group.
translation.ja: みんなに元気をくれる

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] If someone is fed up one day…
translation.ja: 落ち込むことだってある

translation.en: …she makes that person laugh.
translation.ja: でもリサが笑わせてくれるの

translation.en: She keeps us energized.
translation.ja: 皆を励ましてくれる存在ね

translation.en: [Lisa in English] Sometimes I feel like… [in Korean] …I think I overreact a lot.
translation.ja: 自分ではやり過ぎかなと思うことがある

translation.en: Or I tend to try to bring too much positivity
translation.ja: わざと明るく振る舞いすぎかなって

translation.en: when the mood is sour.
translation.ja: 雰囲気が悪い時とか

translation.en: -[Jennie in English] But it really helps. -Really?
translation.ja: ありがたいよ 本当？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: I'll keep doing that.
translation.ja: じゃ このままで

translation.en: -Keep going. -Yeah, keep going, Lisa! [laughs]
translation.ja: うん そのままで このままよ　リサ！

translation.en: [Rosé] How we stay tight as a group is we try to take care of ourselves individually,
translation.ja: ４人それぞれが自分の調子を保てれば

translation.en: and then come together healthy and happy so that the whole thing works.
translation.ja: グループとしてもうまくまとまれる

translation.en: [Jennie] Sometimes, when I look like I'm really tired and angry,
translation.ja: 疲れてたり怒ってるように見えても…

translation.en: that is my happy face.
translation.ja: 楽しいのよ

translation.en: We're all human, and we're ladies, so we have our moments.
translation.ja: 私たちも人間だし―  女子だし…　色々ある

translation.en: But when you have the good positive energy going on, it helps.
translation.ja: でもポジティブでいればうまくいくはず

translation.en: Los Angeles, what's up? We're BLACKPINK on 97.1 AMP radio.
translation.ja: ２０１９年４月ラジオをお聞きの皆さん ラジオをお聞きの皆さん BLACKPINKです

translation.en: [radio host] You guys, the first female Korean group to perform at Coachella.
translation.ja: コーチェラに出演するんだって？

translation.en: -[all members] Oh, my gosh! -What?
translation.ja: うれしい すごいな

translation.en: [reporter] The K-pop girl band called BLACKPINK
translation.ja: 今週末 BLACKPINKがアメリカにやって来ます コーチェラ

translation.en: is in the US this weekend.
translation.ja: 今週末 BLACKPINKがアメリカにやって来ます コーチェラ 今週末 BLACKPINKがアメリカにやって来ます

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] Because it's such a big festival,
translation.ja: あの有名なフェスティバルに

translation.en: when I was told that we were going, I couldn't believe it.
translation.ja: 出演するなんて信じられない

translation.en: [in English] Are we going to Coachella? BLACKPINK? Are you sure?
translation.ja: BLACKPINKがコーチェラに？

translation.en: [in Thai] Is this for real?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] Look over there!
translation.ja: 見て すごい

translation.en: [Rosé in English] I'm so excited. This is cool!
translation.ja: 興奮する いいね

translation.en: It was really nerve-wracking.
translation.ja: 本当に緊張した

translation.en: We're a group from South Korea representing our country.
translation.ja: 韓国を代表してここにいるわけだから

translation.en: [Jennie] We were just so ready to tell the world that we've been waiting for this.
translation.ja: 憧れてた舞台だし準備はできていた

translation.en: [in Korean] Since we don't have much time…
translation.ja: あまり時間がないから―

translation.en: [in English] …we're gonna skip "Stay,"
translation.ja: “Stay”はスキップ

translation.en: and we're gonna go from "Whistle" and "Kiss and Make Up."
translation.ja: "WHISTLE"と"Kiss and Make Up"をやる

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] I was so nervous because I didn't know
translation.ja: 観客の反応が想像できなくて

translation.en: how our American fans would react.
translation.ja: ずっと緊張していた

translation.en: [Rosé in English] Usually, a BLACKPINK tour is filled with fans who come to watch us,
translation.ja: ツアーにはファンが私たちを見に来るけど

translation.en: but people who come to Coachella are just people who love music in general.
translation.ja: コーチェラには音楽ファンが来る

translation.en: I personally was really worried that not many people would walk up to our show.
translation.ja: 観客が集まるのか心配だった

translation.en: [Jennie] I didn't even think we would have,
translation.ja: そんなに多くの人が来るとは思ってなかった

translation.en: I don't know, 100 people or 200 people at least.
translation.ja: そんなに多くの人が来るとは思ってなかった せめて200人くらいはいてほしいなって感じで

translation.en: I was just hoping to have somebody watching us.
translation.ja: せめて200人くらいはいてほしいなって感じで

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] I was so sick.
translation.ja: 体調が悪くて…

translation.en: That was the sickest I've ever been.
translation.ja: 今までにないくらい不調だった

translation.en: My back was killing me. It hurt to move.
translation.ja: 背中が痛くて動けないほどだったの

translation.en: -I was pretty worried. -We were very worried.
translation.ja: 不安だった 不安しかなかったね

translation.en: [staff 1] Break a leg.
translation.ja: お願いします

translation.en: [staff 2] We're following Coachella.
translation.ja: こちらへ

translation.en: [in English] Let's go.
translation.ja: さあ いこう

translation.en: [Jisoo in Korean] When I got onto that stage,
translation.ja: ステージに立つと

translation.en: I actually didn't realize that there were so many people.
translation.ja: 驚くほど多くの観客が見えた

translation.en: [Rosé] Why are there so many people?
translation.ja: なぜ こんなに？

translation.en: [Jennie] I don't know.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: There are so many people.
translation.ja: いっぱいいる

translation.en: -[Jennie] We can do it. -[Lisa] We can do it. It's fine.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 私たちならできる

translation.en: [all] One, two, three! Go!
[staff] Jennie and Rosé, that way.
translation.ja: ジェニーとロゼはあっちへ

translation.en: Water, water, water!
translation.ja: お水ちょうだい

translation.en: Eye drops, somebody!
translation.ja: 目薬持ってきて

translation.en: Relax.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて

translation.en: [staff] We're starting now!
translation.ja: もう始まるよ

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] I was so nervous. The moment I stepped foot on the stage
translation.ja: 舞台に出ていく瞬間はドキドキした

translation.en: and saw all the crowds shouting and cheering…
translation.ja: 大勢の人が歓声を上げてるのが見えたの

translation.en: [Lisa] …I got the feeling, "This is it!"
translation.ja: でもいざ始まると― スイッチが入った

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I think Coachella was the moment where I felt like
translation.ja: ただのＫ-ＰＯＰじゃないと

translation.en: there are people that understand that this isn't just K-pop music.
translation.ja: 受け止めてもらえたんだと思う

translation.en: They see us as doing something new, and I really like that. [giggles]
translation.ja: 新しい音楽だと思ってもらえるのはうれしい

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] All races and all kinds of people came together there.
translation.ja: 会場には色々な人種の人が集まる

translation.en: So it helped emphasize… [in English] …this represents BLACKPINK.
translation.ja: それはまさに私たちBLACKPINKと同じ

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I'm happy to be in an era
translation.ja: 新しい文化や音楽に対して

translation.en: where people are open to new culture, new music.
translation.ja: 人々が寛容でうれしく思う

translation.en: Who would have imagined, at Coachella,
translation.ja: だってコーチェラで―

translation.en: thousands of people singing in Korean… [in Korean] "Playing with fire"? [in English] What?
translation.ja: 何千人もの人が韓国語で歌ってるのよ

translation.en: [Rosé in English] It doesn't matter the size of the audience.
translation.ja: 大事なのは観客の人数じゃなく

translation.en: It just matters if it's the right atmosphere.
translation.ja: 会場がいい雰囲気に包まれること

translation.en: Everybody's on the same vibe.
translation.ja: 一体となってね

translation.en: [Jennie in English] This was a moment where I felt really satisfied with our work.
translation.ja: まさにこの時は達成感を感じることができた

translation.en: Like all those training years were worth it!
translation.ja: 長年のトレーニングも報われた

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] It makes me feel that… I had chosen the right path.
translation.ja: この道を選んで良かったと思えた

translation.en: This was what I really wanted to do in my life.
translation.ja: これこそ私が人生に望むもの

translation.en: [Lisa in English] We had so much fun.
translation.ja: すごく楽しかった

translation.en: I think I'll remember today for the rest of my life.
translation.ja: 今日のことは 一生忘れない

translation.en: [Jennie] We love you guys!
translation.ja: 愛してるわ

translation.en: -[Jisoo] Thank you, guys! -[Lisa] Thank you so much.
translation.ja: どうもありがとう

translation.en: [Rosé] Goodnight!
translation.ja: おやすみ

translation.en: [reporter] There's been lots of news coming from Coachella,
translation.ja: 今年のコーチェラでは―

translation.en: but one group that has everybody talking is BLACKPINK.
translation.ja: BLACKPINKが話題を独占 BLACKPINKが話題を独占〝会場を沸かせたBLACKPINK〞

translation.en: If you didn't know who they were before, you definitely know who they are now.
translation.ja: 〝会場を沸かせたBLACKPINK〞今回初めて知った方も多いでしょう 今回初めて知った方も多いでしょう 今回初めて知った方も多いでしょう〝Ｋ-ＰＯＰスターが光り輝く〞

translation.en: [in Korean] After Coachella, I think I figured out
translation.ja: コーチェラのステージを経験してからは―

translation.en: how to have fun on stage.
translation.ja: ライブを楽しむことを覚えた

translation.en: Don't concentrate on just yourself, but feed off this passion raging around you.
translation.ja: 自分に集中せず会場の熱気を楽しむことをね

translation.en: [in English] Have fun. Have fun with this.
translation.ja: とにかく楽しむ

translation.en: [Lisa in Thai] It doesn't matter if we grow old and get replaced by a new younger generation.
translation.ja: この先若い世代に取って変わられても

translation.en: As long as there is still someone talking about us.
translation.ja: それはそれで構わない

translation.en: Because they will still remember how we shone so bright.
translation.ja: 忘れないでいてくれればね

translation.en: ♪ Uh, I'ma fall in love, baby ♪
translation.ja: アムステルダム

translation.en: ♪ You gon' finna catch me ♪ ♪ Uh, give you all of this, baby ♪
translation.ja: マンチェスター

translation.en: ♪ Call me pretty and nasty ♪
translation.ja: ロンドン

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we gonna get it My love you can bet it on ♪ ♪ Black, we gon' double The stack on them, whoa! ♪
translation.ja: ベルリン

translation.en: ♪ I'll be you Bonnie and you be my Clyde ♪
translation.ja: パリ

translation.en: ♪ We ride or die Xs and Os ♪
translation.ja: パリ バルセロナ

translation.en: ♪ Tonight won't you set me free… ♪
translation.ja: シドニー

translation.en: [in English] I want everybody to stand up!
translation.ja: みんな 立って！

translation.en: [Rosé in English] We all have dreams, hunger to make it.
translation.ja: 夢をかなえるために一生懸命だった

translation.en: When you're really invested in what you do,
translation.ja: 努力した分だけ―

translation.en: that's what makes things happen.
translation.ja: 結果はついてくる

translation.en: [Rosé in English] We love you, Bangkok!
translation.ja: 大好きよ　バンコク

translation.en: Thank you so much!
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: [Rosé] Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Sadly, very, very extremely sadly,
translation.ja: これを言うのはすごく悲しいけど…

translation.en: Like we said before, this will be our last concert on this tour.
translation.ja: 今日で世界ツアーも終わってしまう

translation.en: And I feel like all four of us, we did really well,
translation.ja: 私たち４人とも精一杯やったし―

translation.en: and I'm very proud of each and every one of us.
translation.ja: すごく誇りに思う

translation.en: -'Cause we went through a lot. -[crowd screaming]
translation.ja: 頑張った

translation.en: Like, I know you guys only see the stuff that's on stage,
translation.ja: ステージ上では見せないことも色々あって

translation.en: but I feel like we all go through so much else… [voice breaks] …and I'm very proud.
translation.ja: 全てを乗り越えられたことを誇りに思う

translation.en: [Rosé] During the shows, we're always looking out and talking to the audience.
translation.ja: 普段は観客にしか話しかけないのに―

translation.en: Then I was talking, and I kinda looked at my members, and I was like, "Ah!" Then I started crying.
translation.ja: 皆に話し始めたらグッときちゃったの

translation.en: Because it felt like the first time talking to, you know, each.
translation.ja: 舞台上では普段 話さないから…

translation.en: Like, I feel like it's so hard that everybody stays away from home…
translation.ja: 家族と離れて暮らすのも本当はつらかった

translation.en: Happy tears.
translation.ja: 幸せの涙

translation.en: -Happy tears. -Happy tears. It's okay.
translation.ja: 幸せの涙 そう 大丈夫よ

translation.en: [Jennie] And every time we're in Thailand, I get really emotional.
translation.ja: タイに行くと感情的になる

translation.en: -[all giggling] -I don't know why.
translation.ja: なぜだろう

translation.en: -Now I'm gonna cry. I don't want to cry. -[Rosé] Everybody's gonna cry.
translation.ja: 私まで泣きたくなっちゃう

translation.en: -[Jisoo] Everyone, cry. -[Rosé] Everyone, cry! [laughs]
translation.ja: リサも泣いてる こっちも

translation.en: So, it's like a train. It's me and then Jennie unnie.
translation.ja: 私の次にジェニー

translation.en: And if she cries, then Lisa cries, and then…
translation.ja: そしたらリサも泣いた

translation.en: [in Korean] I don't cry. [laughs]
translation.ja: 泣いてないよ

translation.en: I don't cry. I cry last.
translation.ja: 涙は見せない 最後だけ

translation.en: [in English] Thank you so much for coming. Bye!
translation.ja: 来てくれてありがとう

translation.en: [staff 1 in Korean] Watch your step. Be careful.
translation.ja: 危ないから 気をつけて

translation.en: [chuckles] A fan?
translation.ja: うちわ？

translation.en: [Jennie in English] I'm very proud of what we've created as BLACKPINK.
translation.ja: 自分たちの活動に誇りを持ってる

translation.en: [Rosé] We grew into something that we didn't even know was possible.
translation.ja: 想像以上のことが達成できたと思う

translation.en: And as much as fans are surprised with the outcome,
translation.ja: ファンが喜んでくれると私たちもうれしい

translation.en: we are as well. And so, it feels like a journey that they're on with us.
translation.ja: だからファンと一緒に旅してる感覚でいる

translation.en: [Jennie] When somebody asks me, "Do you have pressure about it?"
translation.ja: プレッシャーはない

translation.en: I'm like, "No," because I feel like we're doing a great job,
translation.ja: 最善を尽くしてるから

translation.en: and we have more to show you guys. It's just the beginning.
translation.ja: 今は まだ始まりすぎないわ

translation.en: [Lisa in Korean] Meat, meat!
translation.ja: お肉が食べたい

translation.en: [waiter] Careful of the hot plate.
translation.ja: 熱いですよ

translation.en: -[Rosé] That looks amazing! -[Jisoo] Can I have a bite?
translation.ja: おいしそう ひと口ちょうだい

translation.en: [Lisa in English] Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: -[Rosé in Korean] Do you know us? -Yes.
translation.ja: 私たちのこと知ってます？

translation.en: -Weren't you here before? -[Jisoo] Yes, that's right.
translation.ja: 以前もいらしてた 練習生時代によく来てました

translation.en: -We were here when we were trainees. -[waiter] Yes, you guys ate here.
translation.ja: 練習生時代によく来てました ここで よく食べてましたね

translation.en: -I remember. -[Lisa] I've been here since the start.
translation.ja: ここで よく食べてましたね そうです

translation.en: [Jisoo] Really? Is that why you're so nice now?
translation.ja: 本当？ 優しいですね

translation.en: Yes. I hope you enjoy the food.
translation.ja: ごゆっくり

translation.en: -[waiter] Thank you. -[Lisa] Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとうございます

translation.en: [Rosé] Halsey contacted me all of a sudden.
translation.ja: ホールジーから連絡が

translation.en: [Jennie] She was at Paris?
translation.ja: パリで？

translation.en: [in English] She's like, "You in Paris?" I'm like, "Don't tell me you're here."
translation.ja: そう　本当に偶然

translation.en: It was my first time meeting her. I felt like it was my fifth time.
translation.ja: 初対面の気がしなくて…

translation.en: And she said the same. Like, "Was this our first time?"
translation.ja: 彼女も同じこと言ってた

translation.en: I'm like, "Yeah." She's just like us. She just talks like us.
translation.ja: 私たちに似てると思う

translation.en: -[Jennie] Is she from America, or… -Yeah, I think she's from LA?
translation.ja: アメリカ出身？ ＬＡかな

translation.en: [Lisa] LA! Come on, LA!
translation.ja: ＬＡか

translation.en: -[in Korean] I want to live in Paris. -Me too! For a year.
translation.ja: パリに住みたい 私も！　１年ね

translation.en: -We will stay for a year. -[Jisoo] You're Parisian already.
translation.ja: パリに住もうよ

translation.en: After a year, I'd like to go to the US.
translation.ja: 私はアメリカに行きたい

translation.en: I want to live in Paris, but I also want to live in the US and England.
translation.ja: パリもいいしアメリカもイギリスもいいね

translation.en: [Lisa] Twenty years?
translation.ja: 20年後？

translation.en: [Jisoo] I feel like Lisa would be traveling around the world.
translation.ja: リサは世界を回ってそう

translation.en: [in English] Forty three?
translation.ja: 43歳かあ

translation.en: -[Lisa] I'm gonna be 40? -[Rosé] I'm gonna be 42.
translation.ja: 私は40歳？

translation.en: -[Lisa] Gonna be 40. -[Rosé] We're gonna be 42.
translation.ja: 私は42歳

translation.en: I feel we'll all be-- Do you think we'll all be married by then?
translation.ja: ４人とも結婚してるかな？

translation.en: -[Rosé] I think we might. -Of course! It's 40… Like, come on!
translation.ja: もちろん　43歳でしょ？

translation.en: [Jennie] I don't know about babies, but…
translation.ja: 子供はどうかな

translation.en: [in Korean] …I think we'd all be married.
translation.ja: 全員 結婚してる

translation.en: We'd have babies by then. Forty-two, 44…
translation.ja: 子供もいるよ

translation.en: [Jisoo] We'll have children?
translation.ja: そうかな？

translation.en: If not, we could also get married later in life.
translation.ja: 子供のことを考えなければ晩婚でもいい

translation.en: [Jisoo] We'll be freshly married?
translation.ja: 新婚かな？

translation.en: No newborns!
translation.ja: 子供はまだかも

translation.en: Aren't we going to make a comeback?
translation.ja: 復帰しようよ

translation.en: [Jisoo] At that age?
translation.ja: その歳で？

translation.en: We'll injure our backs!
translation.ja: 背中を痛めそう

translation.en: [Jisoo] I don't think we'll be able to dance.
translation.ja: 踊れない気がする

translation.en: We'll have to stand.
translation.ja: 頑張れるよ
